316510.name: My Lands: Miner’s Luck - Extended DLC Pack
316510.description:
The present add-on increase the mining speed of all resource types for 6 months (180 days)

This package includes:
  • Production in Woodcutter Cabins of all estates +25%
  • Production in Stone Quarries of all estates +25%
  • Production in Iron Plants of all estates +25%
  • Production in Windmills of all estates +25%
  • Production in Trading Posts of all estates +25%
  • Production in Gold Plants of all estates +25%
316510.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 捷克语, 荷兰语, 芬兰语, 希腊语, 匈牙利语, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 俄语, 瑞典语, 保加利亚语, 土耳其语, 韩语, 丹麦语
